abstract: Government of Singapore Investment Corp.’s talks with Banco BTG Pactual to buy a 15 percent stake in the Brazilian investment bank worth about $2.4 billion are at an advanced stage, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
snippet: Government of Singapore Investment Corp.’s talks with Banco BTG Pactual to buy a 15 percent stake in the Brazilian investment bank worth about $2.4 billion are at an advanced stage, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person familiar with t...
lead_paragraph: Government of Singapore Investment Corp.‘s talks with Banco BTG Pactual to buy a 15 percent stake in the Brazilian investment bank worth about $2.4 billion are at an advanced stage, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: G.I.C. Said to Near Deal for Brazilian Bank Stake

abstract: Foster’s Group said Wednesday that it had received — and rejected — an unsolicited bid from an unidentified private equity firm offering from 2.3 billion Australian dollars to 2.7 billion dollars for its wine business, which it has said it plans to demerge from its beer operations.
snippet: Foster’s Group said Wednesday that it had received — and rejected — an unsolicited bid from an unidentified private equity firm offering from 2.3 billion Australian dollars to 2.7 billion dollars for its wine business, which it has said it plans t...
lead_paragraph: Foster’s Group said Wednesday that it had rejected an unsolicited bid from an unidentified private equity firm offering from 2.3 billion  to 2.7 billion Australian dollars for its wine business, which it said it planned to spin off from its beer operations.
